plot outline: A sales executive in a real-estate company finds himself in a less-than-pleasing job, in which he ends up being the 'mama' who ferries his boss' muses during the latter's private rendezvous moments. Tricky situations lead him to get stuck in many awkward moments. Will he be able to eventually get out of them all?
title: Hello Mama
plot: A sales executive in a real-estate company finds himself in a less-than-pleasing job, in which he ends up being the 'mama' who ferries his boss' muses during the latter's private rendezvous moments. Tricky situations lead him to get stuck in many awkward moments. Will he be able to eventually get out of them all?::sukanya suresh
